entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
